alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 7:35PM CST until December 12 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Hunt, Kaufman and Rockwall Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Caution should be exercised near the river as water begins to flow out of the banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 4.7 feet Friday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
